dataSecurity.question: How secure is my financial information?
dataSecurity.answer: Your data is completely secure as it is stored locally on your device. We use strong encryption and never send your financial information to any servers.

browserData.question: What happens to my data if I clear browser data?
browserData.answer: If you clear browser data, your budget information will be deleted. We recommend regularly exporting your data as a backup using the Data Manager.

backupData.question: How can I backup my budget data?
backupData.answer: You can easily backup your data using the Export Data button in the dashboard. This creates a JSON file with all your budget information that you can securely store.

familySharing.question: Can I share my budget with family members?
familySharing.answer: Yes, you can share your budget with family members. Each member can have their own access level and permissions to view or manage the budget.

recurringExpenses.question: How do recurring expenses work?
recurringExpenses.answer: Recurring expenses automatically repeat based on the specified schedule (weekly or monthly). The system will track these expenses and include them in your budget calculations.

budgetAlerts.question: Can I set up budget alerts?
budgetAlerts.answer: Yes, you can set up alerts for both overall budget and individual categories. You'll receive notifications when spending reaches certain thresholds.

savingsTracking.question: How can I track my savings goals?
savingsTracking.answer: You can create and track multiple savings goals in the Savings Goals section. Set target amounts, deadlines, and monitor your progress with visual indicators.

exportData.question: Can I export my budget data?
exportData.answer: Yes, you can export your budget data at any time using the Data Manager. This creates a JSON file with all your budget information that you can backup or transfer.

aiAssistant.question: How does the AI assistant help with budgeting?
aiAssistant.answer: The AI assistant analyzes your spending patterns and provides personalized recommendations for budget optimization, savings opportunities, and financial insights.

categoryLimit.question: Is there a limit to how many categories I can create?
categoryLimit.answer: No, there is no limit to the number of budget categories you can create. You can add, edit, or remove categories as needed to match your budgeting style.
